sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Users, Globe, Target, Award, BookOpen, Video, Clock, CheckCircle, Star, MessageCircle, Calendar, Play } from 'lucide-react'; import ContactForm from '../components/ContactForm'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const About = () => { const [isFormOpen, setIsFormOpen] = useState(false); const stats = [ { number: "500+", label: "Students Worldwide", icon: }, { number: "25+", label: "Countries", icon: }, { number: "95%", label: "Satisfaction Rate", icon: }, { number: "50+", label: "Live Classes/Month", icon:
